synopsis.text:
Excellent Era is on the horizon as the world of Glory, a popular MMORPG, expands its reach and influence in the realm of esports. Ye Qiu and Su Muqiu, two ambitious friends, share a dream of turning their passion for gaming into a professional career. As China prepares to host the first professional league of Glory, culminating in the prestigious Glory Championship, the duo decides to form their own team. With the support of their boss and owner of the Excellent Era internet cafe, Tao Xuan, they embark on a thrilling journey to conquer the competitive world of Glory.

In this prequel to Quan Zhi Gao Shou (The King's Avatar), witness Ye Xiu's entry into the pro gaming world and the first Pro League series tournament. As Team Excellent Era, Ye Qiu and Su Muqiu strive to prove themselves against skilled opponents, determined to climb the ranks and make their mark in the rapidly growing esports scene. Will they rise to the challenge and turn their dreams into reality, or will they face defeat at the hands of formidable adversaries? Join them as they embark on an unforgettable adventure, heralding a new era of gaming.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
